statements: SELECT * FROM educational_resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM educational_resources WHERE created_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT resource_id, resource_name FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT resource_type FROM educational_resources;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_url FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Video' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM educational_resources ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT resource_type, COUNT(*) FROM educational_resources GROUP BY resource_type;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, resource_url FROM educational_resources WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_url FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Video' AND resource_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM videos;
SELECT title, description, upload_date FROM videos;
SELECT video_id, title, duration FROM videos WHERE duration > 300;
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE total_questions >= 10;
SELECT quiz_id, passing_score FROM quizzes;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE duration > 60 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT title, description FROM videos WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT video_id, title, duration FROM videos JOIN quizzes ON videos.video_id = quizzes.quiz_id WHERE total_questions > 10;
SELECT * FROM videos LEFT JOIN quizzes ON videos.video_id = quizzes.quiz_id WHERE passing_score >= 80;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_videos FROM videos;
SELECT * FROM videos;
SELECT video_title, video_url FROM videos WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_title, quiz_difficulty FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_duration > 30;
SELECT * FROM quizzes ORDER BY quiz_difficulty DESC;
SELECT resource_title, resource_url FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'PDF';
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE resource_type='video';
SELECT resource_id, resource_title FROM resources ORDER BY resource_title DESC;
SELECT quiz_title, quiz_duration FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_difficulty='hard' ORDER BY quiz_duration DESC;
SELECT video_title, instructor_id FROM videos WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_duration > 30;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT title, description FROM videos;
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT title, type FROM resources WHERE type = 'video';
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_id = 1;
SELECT title, description FROM videos ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT url FROM videos WHERE video_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM quizzes JOIN videos ON quizzes.quiz_id = videos.video_id;
SELECT title, type FROM resources WHERE type = 'PDF';
SELECT * FROM Videos ORDER BY upload_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, duration FROM Videos WHERE duration > 10;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT quiz_id, title, question_count FROM Quizzes ORDER BY question_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserScores WHERE score > 80;
SELECT * FROM Videos WHERE duration > 10 ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT title, description FROM Videos WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT title, question_count, passing_score FROM Quizzes WHERE passing_score > 80;
SELECT u.username, v.title, uvp.last_watched FROM Users u INNER JOIN UserVideoProgress uvp ON u.user_id = uvp.user_id INNER JOIN Videos v ON uvp.video_id = v.video_id;
